name: Night Transactions
description: Rule to detect night transactions
condition: EXTRACT(HOUR FROM t.trans_time) BETWEEN 0 AND 4 AND t.trans_amt > 10000

description: Rule to detect high total transaction 30d

description: Rule to detect high volume recent activity

name: High Spending Engineer in Crypto Wallet
description: Rule to detect high spending engineer in crypto wallet
condition: t.occupation = 'Engineer' AND t.origination = 'Crypto Wallet' AND uts.sum_30d > 200000

name: Frequent ATM Transactions by Seniors
description: Rule to detect frequent atm transactions by seniors
condition: t.occupation = 'Engineer' AND t.age > 60 AND t.origination = 'ATM' AND uts.trans_count_30d > 50

description: Rule to detect low avg but high count for teachers

description: Rule to detect branch origination high avg

description: Rule to detect online origination with low balance and high sum

description: Rule to detect international transfers by artists with high sum

description: Rule to detect swift origination high count low avg

description: Rule to detect mobile origination with high avg and count

description: Rule to detect frequent pos transactions by lawyers

description: Rule to detect ach origination high sum low avg

name: High Crypto and Night Activity
description: High crypto usage and night transactions

name: Frequent High Value Txns
description: More than 5 High value transactions in last 90 days

name: Recent KYC with High Spend
description: KYC done recently and spent over 100K in last 15 days

name: Geo Diverse Activity
description: Transactions from more than 3 countries

name: Smurfing Pattern
description: Frequent low-value transactions below reporting threshold

name: Unusual Weekday Activity
description: Almost all transactions on weekdays

name: High Burst Activity
description: More than 8 transactions in 24 hours

name: Long Inactivity Then Spike
description: No transactions for long then High count

name: Low Avg Value But High Volume
description: Small average txns but High count

name: Crypto and High Value Combo
description: High crypto and High value txn count

name: Inactivity Spike
description: Very High inactivity period

name: Large Txn Increase
description: Significant change in transaction amount

name: High Risk New User
description: Young user with risky pattern
condition: t.age < 21 AND uts.crypto_txn_ratio_30 > 0.25 AND t.pep_status = TRUE
